entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches developing this evening and dissipating overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:47 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
